mapper.update:
update dream_menu
menu_name = #{menuName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
parent_id = #{parentId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
order_num = #{orderNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
path = #{path,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
component = #{component,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
is_frame = #{isFrame,jdbcType=INTEGER},

update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where menu_id = #{menuId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update dream_menu set menu_name = #{menuName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, parent_id = #{parentId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, order_num = #{orderNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, path = #{path,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, component = #{component,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_frame = #{isFrame,jdbcType=INTEGER}, menu_type = #{menuType,jdbcType=CHAR}, visible = #{visible,jdbcType=CHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=CHAR}, icon = #{icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where menu_id = #{menuId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select distinct m.menu_id, m.parent_id, m.menu_name, m.path, m.component, m.visible, m.is_frame, m.menu_type, m.icon, m.order_num, m.create_time from dream_menu m where m.menu_type in ('M', 'C') and m.visible = 0 order by m.parent_id, m.order_num
